name: HubGame
description: HubGame is a world of 50 NFT games where members can play, earn, trade with all and across games. "One-stop shop. One community. One token. Fifty NFT games." Hubgame Ecosystem is including Launchpad, Payment Gateway, Wallet, Marketplace, Exchange, DeFi and Fifty NFT games. Tokenomics: Minted and distributed upon each time adding a new game to HubGame. Team: Blending business excellence and technical mastery, with business leaders in technology, gaming industry, and fintech, experts in sales and digital marketing, and top-notch blockchain researchers. Partners: Funtap, Funverse Capital, IDG Venture Blockchain, 9 Pay, MEXC, Gate.io and more will be announced very soon. More detail: https://linktr.ee/hubgame
